Open Science Community Galway - Meeting 21 January 2020

Our second meeting! Hardy Schwamm, November 25, 2019

OSCG January 2020 Meeting

Register here if you want to join the Open Science Community Galway

What will happen at this meeting?

This will be the second meeting of Open enthusiasts in Galway. It is still early days for our Community so we need to talk some basics such as members communication and our website.

On the agenda:

  • Update from Monica (@monzc) on the NUI Galway Library negotiations with big publishers
  • Elaine (@ElaineToomey1) and Hardy (@HardySchwamm) on the Open Scholarship Week 2020.
  • Catherine (@catherinecronin) on Open Education and the National Forum

Sounds interesting? Join us!

We hold our meetings in an inclusive and friendly manner over (free) pizza. New Open enthusiasts are always welcome!

If you want to get involved please let us know by using this form.

Where is the meeting ?

NUI Galway, Arts Millennium Building - AM 207 (CELT Training Room)
